log_reader_file_not_found: debug.log file does not exist. Enable debug mode in the settings to create it.
delete_char_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the character '{name}'? This action cannot be undone.
theme_change_restart_message: The theme has been changed. Please restart the application for the changes to take effect.
qdarkstyle_not_found_tooltip: Module 'qdarkstyle' not found. Run 'pip install qdarkstyle' to enable the dark theme.
bulk_delete_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the {count} selected characters? This action cannot be undone.
invalid_race_class_combo: The {race} race cannot play the {class} class
migration_confirm_message:
This operation will reorganize your character folders.

Old structure: Characters/Realm/Character
New structure: Characters/Season/Realm/Character

Do you want to continue?
migration_startup_title: Migration de structure requise / Structure Migration Required / Strukturmigration erforderlich
migration_startup_message_fr:
🇫🇷 FRANÇAIS :
Suite à une modification de structure dans le répertoire des personnages, l'application va restructurer le répertoire "Characters".

📁 Ancienne structure : Characters/Royaume/Personnage.json
📁 Nouvelle structure : Characters/Saison/Royaume/Personnage.json
migration_startup_message_en:
🇬🇧 ENGLISH:
Due to a structure modification in the character directory, the application will restructure the "Characters" folder.

📁 Old structure: Characters/Realm/Character.json
📁 New structure: Characters/Season/Realm/Character.json
migration_startup_message_de:
🇩🇪 DEUTSCH:
Aufgrund einer Strukturänderung im Charakterverzeichnis wird die Anwendung das "Characters"-Verzeichnis umstrukturieren.

📁 Alte Struktur: Characters/Realm/Character.json
📁 Neue Struktur: Characters/Season/Realm/Character.json
migration_rollback_info: Rolling back changes to preserve your data...
migration_warning:
⚠️ Si vous cliquez sur 'Annuler', l'application se fermera sans effectuer de modifications.
⚠️ If you click 'Cancel', the application will close without making any changes.
⚠️ Wenn Sie auf 'Abbrechen' klicken, wird die Anwendung geschlossen, ohne Änderungen vorzunehmen.
migration_question:
Voulez-vous continuer avec la migration ?
Do you want to proceed with the migration?
Möchten Sie mit der Migration fortfahren?
migration_cancelled_title: Migration annulée / Migration Cancelled / Migration abgebrochen
migration_cancelled_message:
🇫🇷 Migration annulée, fermeture du programme.

🇬🇧 Migration cancelled, closing program.

🇩🇪 Migration abgebrochen, Programm wird geschlossen.
migration_path_change_message:
The new character folder uses the old structure.

📁 Structure detected: Characters/Realm/
✅ Required structure: Characters/Season/Realm/

Please restart the application to perform automatic migration.
A ZIP backup will be created before migration.
migration_path_change_question:
The new character folder uses the old structure.

📁 Structure detected: Characters/Realm/
✅ Required structure: Characters/Season/Realm/

Do you want to perform the migration now?
💾 A ZIP backup will be created automatically before migration.
migration_path_change_later: Migration postponed. You can perform the migration later via the Help > Migrate folder structure menu.
disclaimer_message:
🇫🇷 FRANÇAIS :
Ce logiciel est une version Alpha en cours de programmation.
Il est donc soumis à des changements.

Cette application est un outil de gestion de personnages pour Dark Age of Camelot.
Les données sont stockées localement sur votre machine.

🇬🇧 ENGLISH:
This software is an Alpha version currently under development.
It is therefore subject to changes.

This application is a character management tool for Dark Age of Camelot.
Data is stored locally on your machine.

🇩🇪 DEUTSCH:
Diese Software ist eine Alpha-Version, die sich derzeit in der Entwicklung befindet.
Sie unterliegt daher Änderungen.

Diese Anwendung ist ein Charakterverwaltungstool für Dark Age of Camelot.
Daten werden lokal auf Ihrem Computer gespeichert.

───────────────────────────────
Vous pouvez désactiver ce message dans Paramètres > Divers.
You can disable this message in Settings > Miscellaneous.
Sie können diese Meldung in Einstellungen > Verschiedenes deaktivieren.
